titleStmt.title: A short catechisme, summarily comprizing the principall points of Christian faith, somewhat corrected and augmented by Iames Balmford Minister
titleStmt.author: Balmford, James, b. 1556.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, for Richard Boyle,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A necessarie catechisme for all Christians.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
